link.title: Link Nanoleaf
link.description: Press and hold the power button on your Nanoleaf for 5 seconds until the button LEDs start flashing, then click **SUBMIT** within 30 seconds.

manual.title: Provide your token
manual.description: Information on how to get a token is available on https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/nanoleaf/#getting-the-auth-token

error.not_allowing_new_tokens: Nanoleaf is not allowing new tokens, follow the instructions above.
